description: Square provides payment processing, POS systems, invoicing, and e-commerce tools, enabling sellers to accept card payments and manage their business

tools.name: SQUARE_ACCEPT_DISPUTE
tools.description: Tool to accept a dispute and mark it as lost. Use after reviewing all evidence and deciding to accept liability.

inputSchema.title: AcceptDisputeRequest

dispute_id.title: Dispute Id
dispute_id.description: ID of the dispute to accept.

inputSchema.description: Parameters required to accept a dispute.

tools.name: SQUARE_CANCEL_INVOICE
tools.description: Tool to cancel an invoice. Use when you need to void an existing invoice; ensure the invoice isn't in DRAFT or a terminal state before cancelling.

inputSchema.title: CancelInvoiceRequest

version.title: Version
version.description: The current version of the invoice; must match the server’s version.

invoice_id.title: Invoice Id
invoice_id.description: The ID of the invoice to cancel.

inputSchema.description: Parameters for cancelling a Square invoice.

tools.name: SQUARE_CANCEL_PAYMENT
tools.description: Tool to cancel a payment. Use after confirming the payment is in APPROVED status.

inputSchema.title: CancelPaymentRequest

payment_id.title: Payment Id
payment_id.description: The ID of the payment to cancel.

inputSchema.description: Parameters for cancelling a Square payment.

tools.name: SQUARE_CREATE_CARD
tools.description: Tool to create a card on file. Use when you need to securely store a customer's card for future payments. Requires a valid nonce or payment ID.

inputSchema.title: CreateCardRequest

card.title: Card

customer_id.title: Customer Id
customer_id.description: ID of the customer to associate with this card.

reference_id.title: Reference Id
reference_id.description: User-defined reference linking this card to an external entity; max length 128.

billing_address.title: Address

country.title: Country
country.description: Two-letter country code in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.

last_name.title: Last Name
last_name.description: Last name of the billing contact.

first_name.title: First Name
first_name.description: First name of the billing contact.

billing_address.description: Mailing address for the card's billing information.

cardholder_name.title: Cardholder Name
cardholder_name.description: Name on the card; max length 96.

card.description: Details of the card and customer to store on file.

source_id.title: Source Id
source_id.description: Card nonce or payment ID used as the source of card data.

idempotency_key.title: Idempotency Key
idempotency_key.description: Unique key for this CreateCard request (1–45 characters).

verification_token.title: Verification Token
verification_token.description: Token from Payments.verifyBuyer() for SCA/3-D Secure verification.

inputSchema.description:
Parameters for creating a card on file. Provide a unique idempotency key,
a source ID (nonce or payment ID), and card details.

tools.name: SQUARE_CREATE_DISPUTE_EVIDENCE_FILE
tools.description: Tool to upload a file as dispute evidence. Use when you need to attach supporting documents (PDF, image, etc.) to an existing dispute. Use after creating or retrieving a dispute.

inputSchema.title: CreateDisputeEvidenceFileRequest

file.title: FileUploadable
file.description: The file to upload as dispute evidence (max 5 MB). FileUploadable object where 'name' is the filename.

dispute_id.title: Dispute Id
dispute_id.description: The ID of the dispute to upload evidence for.

content_type.title: Content Type
content_type.description: Optional MIME type of the uploaded file. Must be one of image/heic, image/heif, image/jpeg, application/pdf, image/png, image/tiff.

evidence_type.title: Evidence Type
evidence_type.description: Optional type of evidence. Allowed values include GENERIC_EVIDENCE, ONLINE_OR_APP_ACCESS_LOG, AUTHORIZATION_DOCUMENTATION, CANCELLATION_OR_REFUND_DOCUMENTATION, CARDHOLDER_COMMUNICATION, CARDHOLDER_INFORMATION, PURCHASE_ACKNOWLEDGEMENT, DUPLICATE_CHARGE_DOCUMENTATION, PRODUCT_OR_SERVICE_DESCRIPTION, RECEIPT, SERVICE_RECEIVED_DOCUMENTATION, PROOF_OF_DELIVERY_DOCUMENTATION, RELATED_TRANSACTION_DOCUMENTATION, REBUTTAL_EXPLANATION, TRACKING_NUMBER.

idempotency_key.title: Idempotency Key
idempotency_key.description: A unique key for this upload to ensure idempotency (max 45 characters).

inline_file_name.title: Inline File Name
inline_file_name.description: Optional filename for inline file content. Defaults to the FileUploadable name.

inline_file_mimetype.title: Inline File Mimetype
inline_file_mimetype.description: Optional MIME type for inline file content. Defaults to the FileUploadable mimetype or application/octet-stream.

inline_file_content_base64.title: Inline File Content Base64
inline_file_content_base64.description: Optional base64-encoded file content. When provided, the file will be uploaded from this inline content instead of fetching from FileUploadable storage.

inputSchema.description:
Parameters to upload a file as dispute evidence.
Endpoint: POST /v2/disputes/{dispute_id}/evidence-files

tools.name: SQUARE_CREATE_DISPUTE_EVIDENCE_TEXT
tools.description: Tool to upload text as evidence for a dispute challenge. Endpoint: POST /v2/disputes/{dispute_id}/evidence-text

inputSchema.title: CreateDisputeEvidenceTextRequest

dispute_id.title: Dispute Id
dispute_id.description: The ID of the dispute to upload text evidence for.

evidence_text.title: Evidence Text
examples: Customer acknowledged receipt via email on 2024-10-01.
evidence_text.description: The text string to upload as evidence (max 500 characters).

evidence_type.title: Evidence Type
evidence_type.description: Optional type of evidence. Allowed values include GENERIC_EVIDENCE, ONLINE_OR_APP_ACCESS_LOG, AUTHORIZATION_DOCUMENTATION, CANCELLATION_OR_REFUND_DOCUMENTATION, CARDHOLDER_COMMUNICATION, CARDHOLDER_INFORMATION, PURCHASE_ACKNOWLEDGEMENT, DUPLICATE_CHARGE_DOCUMENTATION, PRODUCT_OR_SERVICE_DESCRIPTION, RECEIPT, SERVICE_RECEIVED_DOCUMENTATION, PROOF_OF_DELIVERY_DOCUMENTATION, RELATED_TRANSACTION_DOCUMENTATION, REBUTTAL_EXPLANATION, TRACKING_NUMBER.

idempotency_key.title: Idempotency Key
idempotency_key.description: A unique key identifying the request (max 45 characters).

inputSchema.description:
Parameters to upload text evidence for a dispute.
Endpoint: POST /v2/disputes/{dispute_id}/evidence-text

tools.name: SQUARE_CREATE_INVOICE_ATTACHMENT
tools.description: Tool to upload a file and attach it to a Square invoice. Use when you need to add supplementary documents to an invoice in DRAFT, SCHEDULED, UNPAID, or PARTIALLY_PAID state.

inputSchema.title: CreateInvoiceAttachmentRequest

file.title: FileUploadable
file.description: File to upload. FileUploadable object where 'name' is the attachment filename.

invoice_id.title: Invoice Id
invoice_id.description: The ID of the invoice to attach the file to.

description.title: Description
description.description: Description for the attachment shown on the invoice; max 128 characters.

idempotency_key.title: Idempotency Key
idempotency_key.description: A unique key to ensure idempotency for this request; max 128 characters.

inline_file_name.title: Inline File Name
inline_file_name.description: Optional filename for inline file content. Defaults to the FileUploadable name.

inline_file_mimetype.title: Inline File Mimetype
inline_file_mimetype.description: Optional MIME type for inline file content. Defaults to the FileUploadable mimetype or application/octet-stream.

inline_file_content_base64.title: Inline File Content Base64
inline_file_content_base64.description: Optional base64-encoded file content. When provided, the file will be uploaded from this inline content instead of fetching from FileUploadable storage.

inputSchema.description: Parameters to upload and attach a file to a Square invoice.

tools.name: SQUARE_DELETE_DISPUTE_EVIDENCE
tools.description: Tool to delete specified evidence from a dispute. Use when you need to remove an evidence item that is no longer relevant. Use after verifying dispute_id and evidence_id.

inputSchema.title: DeleteDisputeEvidenceRequest

dispute_id.title: Dispute Id
dispute_id.description: ID of the dispute from which to remove evidence.

evidence_id.title: Evidence Id
evidence_id.description: ID of the evidence item to remove.

inputSchema.description:
Parameters required to delete a specific evidence item from a dispute.
Endpoint: DELETE /v2/disputes/{dispute_id}/evidence/{evidence_id}

tools.name: SQUARE_DELETE_INVOICE
tools.description: Tool to delete a Square invoice (only DRAFT invoices can be deleted).

inputSchema.title: DeleteInvoiceRequest

version.title: Version
version.description: The version of the invoice to delete. If you do not know the version, retrieve the invoice first via Get Invoice or List Invoices.

invoice_id.title: Invoice Id
invoice_id.description: The ID of the invoice to delete.

inputSchema.description: Parameters for deleting a Square invoice.

tools.name: SQUARE_DELETE_INVOICE_ATTACHMENT
tools.description: Tool to delete an attachment from a Square invoice. Endpoint: DELETE /v2/invoices/{invoice_id}/attachments/{attachment_id}

inputSchema.title: DeleteInvoiceAttachmentRequest

invoice_id.title: Invoice Id
invoice_id.description: The ID of the invoice to delete the attachment from.

attachment_id.title: Attachment Id
attachment_id.description: The ID of the attachment to delete.

inputSchema.description: Parameters to delete an attachment from a Square invoice.

tools.name: SQUARE_DELETE_WEBHOOK_SUBSCRIPTION
tools.description: Tool to delete a Square webhook subscription by ID.

inputSchema.title: DeleteWebhookSubscriptionRequest

subscription_id.title: Subscription Id
subscription_id.description: ID of the webhook subscription to delete.

inputSchema.description: Parameters to delete a specific webhook subscription.

tools.name: SQUARE_GET_DISPUTE_EVIDENCE
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a specific evidence item associated with a given dispute. Endpoint: GET /v2/disputes/{dispute_id}/evidence/{evidence_id}

inputSchema.title: GetDisputeEvidenceRequest

dispute_id.title: Dispute Id
dispute_id.description: ID of the dispute to retrieve evidence for.

evidence_id.title: Evidence Id
evidence_id.description: ID of the evidence item to retrieve.

inputSchema.description: Parameters required to retrieve a specific evidence item for a dispute.

tools.name: SQUARE_GET_INVOICE
tools.description: Tool to retrieve an invoice by ID. Use when you already have an invoice ID and need its details.

inputSchema.title: GetInvoiceRequest

invoice_id.title: Invoice Id
invoice_id.description: The ID of the invoice to retrieve.

inputSchema.description: Parameters for retrieving an invoice by ID.

tools.name: SQUARE_LIST_DISPUTE_EVIDENCE
tools.description: Tool to list evidence items associated with a given dispute. Endpoint: GET /v2/disputes/{dispute_id}/evidence

inputSchema.title: ListDisputeEvidenceRequest

cursor.title: Cursor
cursor.description: A pagination cursor returned by a previous call to this endpoint. Provide this to retrieve the next set of results.

dispute_id.title: Dispute Id
dispute_id.description: ID of the dispute to list evidence for.

inputSchema.description:
Parameters required to list evidence for a specific dispute.
Endpoint: GET /v2/disputes/{dispute_id}/evidence

tools.name: SQUARE_LIST_INVOICES
tools.description: Tool to list invoices for a Square location.

inputSchema.title: ListInvoicesRequest

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of invoices to return (1-200). Defaults to Square's default if unset.

cursor.title: Cursor
cursor.description: Pagination cursor from a previous ListInvoices call; use to fetch the next page.

location_id.title: Location Id
location_id.description: The Square location ID for which to list invoices.

inputSchema.description: Parameters for listing invoices for a specific location.

tools.name: SQUARE_LIST_WEBHOOK_EVENT_TYPES
tools.description: Tool to list available webhook event types. Use when you need to discover event types before creating or updating a webhook subscription.

inputSchema.title: ListWebhookEventTypesRequest

api_version.title: Api Version
api_version.description: Overrides the application default API version (YYYY-MM-DD) for listing event types.

inputSchema.description: Parameters for listing webhook event types. Omit to use the default application version.

tools.name: SQUARE_LIST_WEBHOOK_SUBSCRIPTIONS
tools.description: Tool to list webhook subscriptions. Use when you need to retrieve a page of webhook subscriptions for your application; supports pagination.

inputSchema.title: ListWebhookSubscriptionsRequest

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of subscriptions to return (1-100). Defaults to Square's default if unset.

cursor.title: Cursor
cursor.description: Pagination cursor from a previous call; use to fetch the next page.

sort_order.title: Sort Order
sort_order.description: Sort order by creation time. Allowed values: 'ASC' or 'DESC'.

include_disabled.title: Include Disabled
include_disabled.description: If true, include disabled subscriptions in the response. Defaults to false.

inputSchema.description: Parameters for listing webhook subscriptions. Omit any field to use default behavior.

tools.name: SQUARE_RETRIEVE_DISPUTE
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a Square dispute by ID. Endpoint: GET /v2/disputes/{dispute_id}

inputSchema.title: RetrieveDisputeRequest

dispute_id.title: Dispute Id
dispute_id.description: ID of the dispute to retrieve.

inputSchema.description: Parameters required to retrieve a specific dispute by its ID.

tools.name: SQUARE_RETRIEVE_ORDER
tools.description: Tool to retrieve an order by its ID. Use when you have an order ID and need to fetch its details.

inputSchema.title: RetrieveOrderRequest

order_id.title: Order Id
order_id.description: ID of the order to retrieve.

inputSchema.description: Parameters required to retrieve a specific order by its ID.

tools.name: SQUARE_RETRIEVE_PAYMENT_LINK
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a payment link by ID. Use when you need to fetch full details of a specific checkout link.

inputSchema.title: RetrievePaymentLinkRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: The Square-assigned ID of the payment link to retrieve.

inputSchema.description: Parameters for retrieving a specific payment link by ID.

tools.name: SQUARE_RETRIEVE_WEBHOOK_SUBSCRIPTION
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a Square webhook subscription by ID.

inputSchema.title: RetrieveWebhookSubscriptionRequest

subscription_id.title: Subscription Id
subscription_id.description: ID of the webhook subscription to retrieve.

inputSchema.description: Parameters to retrieve a specific webhook subscription.

tools.name: SQUARE_SUBMIT_DISPUTE_EVIDENCE
tools.description: Tool to submit evidence for a dispute. Use when you have compiled all supporting documentation and want to send it to the cardholder's bank before the due date.

inputSchema.title: SubmitDisputeEvidenceRequest

dispute_id.title: Dispute Id
dispute_id.description: The ID of the dispute to submit evidence for.

inputSchema.description: Parameters to submit evidence for a dispute.

tools.name: SQUARE_TEST_WEBHOOK_SUBSCRIPTION
tools.description: Tool to test a webhook subscription. Use after creating or updating a subscription to verify its endpoint.

inputSchema.title: TestWebhookSubscriptionRequest

event_type.title: Event Type
event_type.description: Event type used for the test; must be one of the subscription's event_types.

subscription_id.title: Subscription Id
subscription_id.description: ID of the webhook subscription to test.

inputSchema.description: Parameters to test a webhook subscription.

tools.name: SQUARE_UPDATE_ORDER
tools.description: Tool to update an order. Use when modifying fields on an existing open order; requires the latest version for optimistic concurrency.

inputSchema.title: UpdateOrderRequest

order.title: Order
order.description: Sparse Order object containing only the fields to update. Must include the latest order.version for concurrency.

order_id.title: Order Id
order_id.description: ID of the order to update.

fields_to_clear.title: Fields To Clear
fields_to_clear.description: List of dot-notation paths of fields to clear/delete in the order, e.g., ['line_items[uid].note']. Only used when removing fields.

idempotency_key.title: Idempotency Key
idempotency_key.description: A unique key to ensure idempotency. Generate a new key per update.

inputSchema.description: Parameters for updating an existing Square order.

tools.name: SQUARE_UPDATE_WEBHOOK_SUBSCRIPTION
tools.description: Tool to update a Square webhook subscription. Use when you need to modify subscription settings such as name, enabled state, event types, notification URL, or API version of an existing webhook subscription.

inputSchema.title: UpdateWebhookSubscriptionRequest

name.title: Name
name.description: New display name for the subscription (max 64 characters).

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Whether the subscription should be active.

api_version.title: Api Version
api_version.description: Webhook API version to use for this subscription, e.g., '2021-06-16'.

event_types.title: Event Types
event_types.description: List of event types to subscribe to, e.g., ['payment.created'].

subscription_id.title: Subscription Id
subscription_id.description: ID of the webhook subscription to update.

inputSchema.description: Parameters to update a specific webhook subscription.

tools.name: SQUARE_UPDATE_WEBHOOK_SUBSCRIPTION_SIGNATURE_KEY
tools.description: Tool to rotate the signature key for a webhook subscription. Use when you need to replace the current signature key for security purposes.

inputSchema.title: UpdateWebhookSubscriptionSignatureKeyRequest

idempotency_key.title: Idempotency Key
idempotency_key.description: A unique string to make this request idempotent. Max 45 characters.

subscription_id.title: Subscription Id
subscription_id.description: The ID of the webhook subscription to rotate the signature key for.

inputSchema.description: Request model for rotating the signature key of a webhook subscription.
